RelatedSentence: KOTA KINABALU : The state government has taken steps to prepare for El Nino which is predicted to last for six months from June to September .

A0: Minister Datuk Seri Panglima Yahya Hussin
RelatedSentence: Deputy Chief Minister Datuk Seri Panglima Yahya Hussin said this would include ensuring that there is sufficient water supply for consumers and the agricultural community in the state .

Yahya , who is also Agriculture and Food Industry Minister , when met after visiting the site for the proposed SK Petagas and SMK Petagas in his constituency yesterday , said this when asked what steps the government would be taking in preparation for El Nino which the Meteorological Department had predicted could be happening from the middle of this year .
